documentation.content:
## Combine grep and exp for Pattern Extraction

```PowerShell
"abc def ghi" | grep "(d\w+)" | exp
```

## Use grep Alias for Select-String

```PowerShell
dir | grep
```

## Use exp Alias for Expand-PSUObject

```PowerShell
dir | exp FullName
```

## Use desktop Function for Directory Navigation

```PowerShell
desktop
desktop someotheruser
```

## Preimport.ps1 Loaded Files (PowerShell)

```powershell
internal\scripts\strings.ps1
internal\configurations\validations\*
internal\configurations\*.ps1
```

## Use exp Alias for Expand-PSUObject (Simplified)

```PowerShell
dir | exp
```

## Use explorer Function for Folder Navigation

```PowerShell
explorer
dir | explorer
gmo PSUtil | explorer
```

## Install PSUtil Module

```PowerShell
Install-Module PSUtil
```

## Postimport File List

```PowerShell
internal\tepp\*.tepp.ps1
internal\tepp\assignment.ps1
internal\scripts\license.ps1
internal\scripts\expandedObjects.ps1
internal\scripts\aliases.ps1
internal\scripts\keybindings.ps1
internal\scripts\license.ps1
internal\conversions\*.ps1
internal\tasks\*.ps1
```

## Add PSUtil to PowerShell Profile

```PowerShell
notepad $profile
```
